description_html:
Glamora is a laboratory where graphic design, elegant craftsmanship and material constitute a single
language, able to transform space with great narrative and emotional value.
Glam-Metal represents a new expression of this global search: a vinyl covering, lined with a thin metallic layer
that lends the wallcovering the shine and reflection of metal. Like a delicate material weaving together of fine
threads, Glam-Metal elicits particular visual and tactile sensations, making the graphics even more arresting
and every environment even more prestigious.
Suitable for covering interior walls and ceilings, the Glam-Metal material can be combined with all subjects in
Glamora’s vast collection of wallcoverings, playing on its affinity and contrast with themes ranging from ethnic
to industrial, vintage to contemporary, and natural to material.
